name: Mutation Cat
description:
This game was made in just over one day for the Discord Jam #5. The theme was "Mutation",  and so the idea is that you're a cat running through different stages of evolution....

It was different in my head.

The music for the three levels was made by Lightning A.

--CONTROLS--

Jump: Space

Fire bullet: Left click

Save and quit: Esc

P.S. I haven't beaten the bonus level yet, so if you do, let me know.

“Nothing in this world is worth having or worth doing unless it means effort, pain, difficulty."

--Theodore Roosevelt
